definition: flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
face/side/surface/aspect/top/classifier for flat surfaces such as drums, mirrors, flags etc
frost/white powder or cream spread over a surface/frosting/(skin) cream

sentences.english: They are marching off to gyms and discovering face cream in record numbers.
sentences.chinese: 他们向健身房进军，物色到的面霜数目已创历史新高。

sentences.english: Complimentary sampler of our new cream with any $25 purchase.
sentences.chinese: 买满25元就可以获赠面霜免费试用装。

sentences.english: The form of mercury used in skin lightening soaps and creams is inorganic mercury.
sentences.chinese: 美白香皂和面霜中所使用的汞是无机形式的汞。

sentences.english: It’s no longer enough to simply slather some creamy concoction on dry skin.
sentences.chinese: 抗衰老已不再只是简单往干燥皮肤上擦面霜了。

sentences.english: I explained that it was good for wrinkles.
sentences.chinese: 我解释说这种面霜对皱纹有好处。
适宜年岁大的抗衰老面霜。

sentences.english: Cosmetics such as face creams, lipsticks and hair preparations are often based on petroleum.
sentences.chinese: 比如面霜，唇膏和发蜡等化妆品通常也是基于石油的。

sentences.english: This foaming cream cleanser could minimize the pores and control shine without feeling tight.
sentences.chinese: 这款泡沫洁面霜可以缩小毛孔减少油光且没有紧绷感。

sentences.english: Creams that claim to get rid of cellulite or wrinkles usually don't.
sentences.chinese: 声称可以去除脂肪和皱纹的面霜通常都不管用。

sentences.english: Always pay attention to take care of themselves, and then wrinkle cream collaboration, it will be ineffective.
sentences.chinese: 往常留意颐养，再协作去皱面霜，是会无效果的。

sentences.english: I like this light creme and use it daily on my face under my makeup or at night.
sentences.chinese: 喜欢这轻质的面霜，每天使用，在上妆前或是晚上。

sentences.english: A: Could I have a look at this facial cream?
sentences.chinese: 我能看一下这个面霜吗？

sentences.english: Anti-ageing cream simply won't just do magic to them.
sentences.chinese: 抗衰老面霜不会轻而易举的地对他们施展魔法。

sentences.english: E. g. Only the gentlest creams are fit for a baby's delicate skin.
sentences.chinese: 只有最温和的面霜才适合宝宝娇弱的皮肤。

sentences.english: I use face cream regularly to keep my face soft.
sentences.chinese: 我常用面霜来保持脸部皮肤的细腻。

sentences.english: Usually use some oil control cream function to improve facial oil.
sentences.chinese: 平时使用一些有控油功能的面霜来改善面部出油状况。
